list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: not decorated or elaborate; simple or ordinary in character.
(of a person) having no pretensions; not remarkable or special.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: a plain, honest man with no nonsense about him
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Một người đàn ông trung thực, trung thực không có gì vô nghĩa về anh ta

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: easy to perceive or understand; clear.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: the advantages were plain to see
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: những lợi thế là đơn giản để xem

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: (of a person) not beautiful or attractive.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Người phụ nữ tóc đen, khá đơn giản

list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: the main problem is just plain exhaustion
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Vấn đề chính chỉ là kiệt sức đơn giản

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: denoting or relating to a type of knitting stitch produced by putting the needle through the front of each stitch from left to right.

list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: perhaps the youth was just plain stupid
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Có lẽ tuổi trẻ chỉ đơn giản là ngu ngốc

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a large area of flat land with few trees.
